title: Education and School 1
sentences: In school we learn many interesting things.
The teacher is explaining the new grammar.
Have you already done your homework?
We are writing an important test today.
Would you like to borrow this book?
Unfortunately, I forgot my dictionary at home.
spielen die Kinder auf dem Hof.
During the break, the children play in the yard.
My favorite subject has always been mathematics.
The student (female) answers the difficult question.
Können Sie das bitte an die
Can you please write that on the board?
Do you have a sheet of paper for me?
The class is very quiet today.
I learn new vocabulary every day.
When do you get your report cards?
The lesson starts punctually at eight o'clock.
I am doing an apprenticeship as a mechatronics technician.
She wants to study at university after school.
The topic of today's lesson is history.
Did you get a good grade?
Ich schreibe die Vokabeln in mein
I write the vocabulary in my notebook.
Can you give me an example?
We have no desire to learn today.
The course lasts three months in total.
dictionary:
die Schule - school
der Lehrer - teacher (male)
die Lehrerin - teacher (female)
die Hausaufgaben - homework
der Test - test
das Buch - book
das Wörterbuch - dictionary
die Pause - break
das Lieblingsfach - favorite subject
die Schülerin - student (female)
der Schüler - student (male)
die Tafel - chalkboard / board
der Bleistift - pencil
das Blatt - sheet (of paper)
die Klasse - class / classroom
die Vokabeln - vocabulary
das Zeugnis (Pl. Zeugnisse) - report card
der Unterricht - lesson / instruction
die Ausbildung - apprenticeship / training
studieren - to study (at university)
das Thema - topic
die Note - grade
das Heft - notebook
das Beispiel - example
die Lust - desire / mood
der Kurs - course
das Wort - word
Hausaufgaben machen - to do homework
